website_summaries.verdict: A decent knee brace, but if you need it for everyday use, it may not last a long time.
pros: Snug fit, but comfortable and offers unmatched support during physical activity
cons: The web portion tends to wear away after consistent use

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This brace provides little to no medial/lateral support with hinges that are just a soft silicone. The velcro bands also continue to bunch up at the upper thigh causing the brace to loosen. The only decent use of this brace is for standing, any dynamic movement or bending of my on knee loosens the strap. The sleeve it came with is decent, but other than that I am disappointed in the product and how much I payed for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Landry

customer_reviews.title: I researched like crazy for a good knee brace
customer_reviews.text: I researched like crazy for a good knee brace. I'd tried everything from the compression ones, to the double jointed things and they were just so bulky and uncomfortable. I was so excited to receive this, but the silicone is soft and just didn't give me any support. I waited too long and lost my chance to return it so I threw an awful lot of money out the window on this one. Unless you can try it on in person or are ready to return if its not for you than I wouldn't recommend purchasing this. A knee brace is just one of those things that you need to try on and feel if its right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Skedaddlin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with knee pain for 2 years I have tried many different braces I have to say this brace is incredible warrant for the first time and could not believe after wearing it all day I had very to almost no knee pain thank you someone thought of a great idea incredible comfortable and most of all it's supports my knee I have a torn meniscus which is extrusive dating pain standing on my feet for 8 hours to 10 hours a day this has given me New Hope that I can actually stand on my legs and not feel the pain thank you once again
customer_reviews.author: linda therrien

customer_reviews.title: It loosens up and slides down
customer_reviews.text: The knee support is great has some awesome support and relieved my knee pain from a miniature tore, but the fitting is unusual it's my size but it slides down on the velcro anchor point, it's fine for a few minutes then is all bend in the sides, one side is flat against the side of the knee and the other is bulging instead of flat. Been doing exercises with it and have to adjust it after every set done with legs and while running it somehow loosens up on the top of the tight. Is weird sometimes. In all is 50/50 i love it for the knee pain but is a bother to adjust after every few steps.
customer_reviews.author: J.Atanacio

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They were onto something but the execution is a disaster. It slides down with or without sleeve and literally digs into top of kneecap, worsening my patellafemoral condition. So not only is it ineffective and increases my pain rather than lessening it but i wasted $80 on it. If it didnt constantly slide down and dig into my kneecap it would be 3 or 4 stars. If i go one size down ( i tried) , it is so small i cant even seal it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky C

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit / Very uncomfortable / NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this fooled by all the 5 star reviews. It's a terribly uncomfortable fit. Maybe if you have perfect model skinny legs it might work for you. Be aware it's NOT RETURNABLE! Wish it would say that in the description!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a surgery we can do again so we strive to protect his knee the best we can while he is on the field
customer_reviews.text: Our son had a DeNovo procedure on his knee. Not a surgery we can do again so we strive to protect his knee the best we can while he is on the field. His PT provided our first brace like this which lasted through a season of football and soccer (as a goalie). The sleeve under finally gave out and eventually the brace took too many dives and broke. We ordered another as he says it fits well, is allowed in soccer and football and protects where the PT said he needs protection. This is our second and we will keep using this brace as long as he is in sports! Great brace!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality knee support brace
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with chondromalacia, as I do Crossfit the doctor recommended me to use this specific knee support brace. I don't run neither do jump boxs because it hurts so much, however, I wear this support brace for some movements such as rope jumps, jumping jacks and such and it really relieves the pain. Each patient is different and not necessarily what worked for one works for everyone, although, for me it has worked fine and I would recommend it, at least you should try it. The materials are really high quality, the brace stay in its place. The color is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Naruto

customer_reviews.title: Design does not match the price.  You can't return it!!!
customer_reviews.text: (Context: I am recovering from MCL replacement surgery) The design does provide some support and protection to the knee but it does not articulate well and is uncomfortable under clothes The sleeve it came with bunched up and the actual brace was uncomfortable against my skin. It has hinges, but they don't work very well and movement of the mesh across the brace causes discomfort. The design is "cool" but if it doesn't work well, whats the point?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Donjoy brace
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with this brace. What I received was nowhere near the picture description. It was too small. I had got one from the doctor's office and the picture was exactly like the one I have already. I ordered 2 in different colors and hoped to match the braces with my clothes. If the manufacturer has changed the design, they should update the picture and description. I wanted to give this 0 stars but Amazon wouldn't let me.
customer_reviews.author: FabGeekMom

customer_reviews.title: patella support with energy transfer
customer_reviews.text: Love this brace! Provides great patella support with energy transfer between flexing and extending. This makes it easier to move while your knee is sore. It’s light weight. If worn under clothing it can grab the pant leg. Compression sleeve provided is the smaller size (medium came with the Med/Lg brace). Compression sleeve does make it more comfortable to wear if you require firm support.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Good Brace for Knee Injury
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me in my knee injury. It does work and serve me well. Initially received one that had a knock off sleeve. Received a replacement and I am rather pleased with this brace. It still serves well for knee injury. Initially it was rather tight but in time it gradually conformed to the areas around my knee for a good fit. I would recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My knee hurts every second of everyday. When I put this on, it makes my knee feel great. Like it was never injured. There is a range of motion issue. Just a little. But for my knee feeling great, I can handle that. If you wear the brace without the extra sock, the Velcro can be irritating. I would recommend this if you have a knee injury.
customer_reviews.author: Lance kimball

customer_reviews.title: Brace doesn't stay up and rips easily.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this brace once. The brace doesn't stay in position, so I was constantly pulling it up my leg. The brace eventually ripped. Amazon won't let me return it. Be warned. This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Still looking...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible idea and very lightweight. I had very high hopes for this product. Unfortunately, it wasn't wide enough to fit my leg well even though I was well within the sizing boundaries, which caused the hinges on the sides to bow outwards instead of actually working. The Ortho told me not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you correct the right size. The measuring tape instructions led me down the wrong path.
customer_reviews.text: thought this would prevent lateral movement but it does not. I also screwed up the size.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: It truly does displace the impact of the exercises I perform (lots of plyometrics) and breathes (unlike the other braces) so is
customer_reviews.text: I am a very active person and have been suffering from knee pain and swelling for the last couple of months. I have tried other wraps and braces, but they didn't give me much relief and I was frustrated that the quality of my workouts was suffering. I ordered the Reaction Knee Brace, after reading many reviews, and was thrilled that my pain was vastly diminished! It truly does displace the impact of the exercises I perform (lots of plyometrics) and breathes (unlike the other braces) so is much more comfortable. I was truly stunned when I received the brace THE NEXT DAY! I highly recommend this brace and the vendor, who shipped it out SO quickly.
customer_reviews.author: wiggie

customer_reviews.title: Have fun with it or hide it.
customer_reviews.text: Buy one for each knee, and lace up some leather to make you into a Roman gladiator for Halloween. The device provides good support for my new artificial knee muscles which have weakened. It is comfortable, looks cool with shorts (many expressions of sympathy at the park) and does not look at all under long pants.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: helps so much with my knee pain. i have tracking issues with my patella (knee cap), my meniscus is wearing away and i have lcl and mcl issues along with tendinitis. i bought this as a last resort as my doctor would not get back with me to get a brace and i had fallen down the stairs due to an unstable knee and haven’t fallen since. my knee seems sturdier and is in less pain
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Hillyard

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLY uncomfortable. The rubber bites into your leg whether ...
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLY uncomfortable. The rubber bites into your leg whether you use the sleeve or not. The opening for the patella seems big enough, but despite ho much I tightened the straps, the brace dropped and dug into the top of the knee cap. I though It just had to conform to my body, but after 2 hours I could not wear it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Needs some work on Velcro strapping...😕
customer_reviews.text: I am an athlete and Occupational Therapist. I needed this brace for everything it said it did. Bottom line: the Velcro did not stay secure for one lifting session of squat cleans. The Velcro strapping consitently “lost its stick” and became unsecure several times during heavy squat cleans. If you are doing something with less knee flexion, it provides good support. Manufacturer needs to work on Velcro. Have to return. Really wanted to like it, design was cool.... but not functional. Oh, and the “compression sleeve” that comes with it is very thin and not any more compressive than a pair of cheap women’s nylons....
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Best pain relief brace I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint, like other complaints here, is that the hinge mechanism is 100% useless for medial/lateral movement restriction. It is just so the brace stays in place well when you're moving around. BUT I must say, this is the best pain relief brace I've ever had, it really does take the concussion of walking/running/sports and disperse it around. I am on month 3 of a bad bone bruise in my tibia and femur and I can do things pain free in the brace, out of the brace I gotta be careful or OK with the pain. It also is aesthetically pleasing, it's very form fitted and slender.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly comfortable and offers good support, but it needs to be readjusted often and the soft rubber frame, while adding to the comfort, will flex when bending instead of just the hinge bending. It may work better on for someone with smaller legs, but the rubber front of the XL/XXL does not cover all the way across my knee. All in all, I would not recommend, its too pricey for a "may work for you"
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, either second to or tied with the McDavid ...
customer_reviews.text: Highest recommendation for my particular situation of wanting to continue hiking and climbing with chondromalacia patella. Aligned my patella very well and held it firmly with enough flexibility to allow the movement I required. Comfortable, either second to or tied with the McDavid 422 brace for comfort. Definitely recommend wear with the undersleeve (comes with one). Sizing runs a bit small so if in doubt go up. I am not tall or heavy and used a M/L and a M undersleeve. Only complaint might be that extra undersleeves are nearly 30 bucks each, which seems awfully pricey for a little tube of cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Husband had a pcl tear where he couldn't run or even bend his knee well for a couple weeks.The dr. said he'd have to wear a brace for the rest of his life when he played basketball. So he tried around 10 different braces on amazon, then we found this one. He's been wearing it for months when he goes outside to play and this has allowed him to strengthen the muscles around the knee. ( He did therapy for a year but that only improved his leg a bit so we stopped) After a few months he can now play with no brace!! It's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Brace OK, but didn't send the right under sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I used the brace for several weeks on long bike rides and it performed well, but the sleeve they sent with it was not the one they advertised and was way to small, so I can't use it. If that's the way they treat customers, I'm not sure I will ever order another one of their products. Incidentally, the size brace I ordered was "medium/large" but the sleeve was just a medium and did not have the hour glass shape. I felt screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bond

customer_reviews.title: Alarmingly average...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very average brace for donjoy. I was not impressed by any stretch. It did an okay job as far as stability and support is concerned, but for the price I was hoping to get a little more out of it. I got a s/m and it was definitely way small. seeing that I’ve torn both ACLs twice, I would not recommend this donjoy product, if you have had serious knee injuries. One positive thing is, it does look cool and everybody want to know about it; a hell of a conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: Kurstie A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed because I need to exchange this brace for the next size up xl/2x. I did measure but the undersleeve is to small. I actually did order another brace for my other knee, next size up. My only complaint is that it says not available for refunds or exchanges. I can't even contact the seller. Hopefully through this the seller will reach out to me. I am allergic to all other knee braces due to the neoprene. Your brace is comfortable and i have not had a allergic reaction. I just want the right size. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very durable and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my mom this is my second one. Was given one before for myself worked great for me very sturdy, and flexible I love mine and it helped so much, so I ordered my mom one and it’s been working prefect, however they do run a little small so size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Best for me
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis and pain in my left knee. Over the years, I have used several different braces. The DonJoy knee brace is by far the best. I put it on in the morning, about 7 AM, and can wear it through the day. It provides both stability and support. I can easily drive, go up and down stairs many times and do moderate exercise with no problem at all. The brace slides when I use the sleeve, so I wear it without the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: BAB

customer_reviews.title: I can easily run 5 miles on an old knee injury
customer_reviews.text: The only knee sleeve that doesn't slide. I can easily run 5 miles on an old knee injury. I'm a big guy and this is a comfortable fit. It was recommended to be by an orthopedic doctor. I recommend it to anyone with knee pain and get asked about it often on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Recommended after Tibial Fracture
customer_reviews.text: My 75yr old grandmother fell and broke her tibial plateau. Her surgeon recommended this brace by name to aid in her recovery. She finds it comfortable and appreciates the support it provides. We purchased on Amazon mobile site while still at the dr's office for $150 less than they were charging, which is much appreciated for someone on a fixed income.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cousin

customer_reviews.title: Ran small even using measurements. Beware it’s a Non returnable item
customer_reviews.text: Seemed decent but small even when using measurements suggested. Tried to return and it’s a no return item even though I used Prime and there is nothing stating it’s a no return item.
customer_reviews.author: Htower

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I measured my leg as instructed and used the sizing chart that they provide in the picture. My measurements fell in the middle of the range for medium/large, so I didn't think I would have to worry but the brace is too small. Like so tight my skin is flowing out of it. It looks like the Pillsbury doughboy trying to put on a corset. They do not allow for returns on this item. Something that they should really consider if their sizing chart is incorrect. What a waste of $75.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, missing necessary part of brace, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product not as shown, the back fabric strap should have a hole in the back of the knee. The version that arrived is solid and hence not preferred as it isn't as flexible. Also the knee sleeve that is worn underneath no is missing?!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Great Brace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 16 year old son who is an athlete and it has been the best one we have purchased. His only complaint is that... because he is active, it's not as conducive for running etc. Otherwise... EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lee Linnemann

customer_reviews.title: This brace kicked butt!
customer_reviews.text: I am really messed up, especially in the knee. Rod in femur misalignment in alighnment in leg movement. Knee flex to outside needed stability for lack of tendons. The rubber knee layer gave elasticity to very tired knee! Wider straps created more comfort to back of leg. First day test i wore brace 7 hr hard to moderate labor, happy to wear again tomorrow! I give this product a thumps up and i am real👍🏻!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beats neoprene!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it 2 weeks and feel like a sales rep! It takes about half an hour to warm up the silicone (plastic, whatever). Then I tighten it more. I have a small medial meniscus tear and this brace goes snuggly over the patella and keeps my knee straight. I forget I'm wearing it, that's the best part.
customer_reviews.author: ~U~

customer_reviews.title: Great brace, but wears out way too quickly
customer_reviews.text: The knee brace worked extremely well initially, but after only 4 months of use, the sleeve will not stay up, and the Velcro on the brace will no longer stay attached and hold it tight, causing it to come loose.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product makes climbing stairs pain free possible. Furthermore, it stabilizes my knee so my body doesn't need to compensate. The overall body tension is diminished. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Loving to Read

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit as described. Does not help my knee and apparently is the only item on Amazon you aren't allowed to return! Do NOT but this. If you really want it, just take your money and throw it in the trash instead. That's how much this knee support worked.
customer_reviews.author: The Bearded Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Good brace, crummy velcro enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Probably going to return--the velcro is very low quality and comes unstuck pretty easily and this after less than a day. When it stays in place it seems to do what it is intended for and why I gave it 3 stars, but for the cost they should have used high-cycle velcro enclosures or at least something that could keep the brace in place. Gets even worse with the compression sleeve as when the velcro loosens the brace slides very easily with the sleeve on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: I really like Donjoy products
customer_reviews.text: I really like Donjoy products. I use to wear a fortitude but it always cut into my leg although it did help. I have a torn ACL MCL and shredded MMR. I can't afford surgery and I got to tell you this really helps out. I swing kettle bell I go on hikes this gives me the stability I need
customer_reviews.author: Ramiel T. LeFebvre

customer_reviews.title: NEWS FLASH....ITEM CAN NOT BE RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be fine, but the sleeve cut off my circulation. Nothing on the product information says this item is not eligible for return, yet when I tried to return the very day I received it, I get the "This product is not eligible to be returned" first time I have been disappointed with Amazon or Don Joy.
customer_reviews.author: David Lasater

customer_reviews.title: poor velcro, doesn't help with runner's knee
customer_reviews.text: This brace doesn't help with runner's knee. Well, maybe it would help if I could tighten the straps more but if I do that the velcro pops off as soon as I bend the knee when running and sometimes even walking.
customer_reviews.author: sickpuppyz

customer_reviews.title: Great for my knee
customer_reviews.text: Helps me with my knee pain daily. I'm waiting for knee surgery and when I have this on, I don't have any knee pain at all. It helps so much.
customer_reviews.author: Judy N.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot return or exchange if size off!
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about this brace and hoping it would work well. The size chart is off. My leg measurements clearly fell in the M/L category but it should have been a an XL/2XL. You cannot return it or exchange it which really sucks if you are having to pay out of pocket since VA won't cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Crilly

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with size ordering
customer_reviews.text: I debated for a while as to what would be the correct size to order, measuring multiple times. Using their guidelines I ordered a medium/large although I was near the border of needing the next size up. I should have followed my instincts and ordered a larger size. The result is that it is difficult to put on and uncomfortable to wear when I am using my crosstrainer or stationary bike. It seems as if this would be a great product if it were the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: My knee likes to partially dislocate when I’m sleeping, and this brace gives me the structure and support around the kneecap that no other brace does. Originally given to me by my doctor a few years ago. I can do some weight lifting with it but not running.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Axt

customer_reviews.title: ... found it to be very uncomfortable due to the poor hinge design
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for several days and found it to be very uncomfortable due to the poor hinge design. The brace bends and bows out instead of bending at the hinge. I found myself removing and reinstalling it several times a day due to it shifting to one side or the other I did wear the accompaning sock that is furnised and it does provide some support on its own without the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device
customer_reviews.text: In use now for a month, this device is very comfortable and provides excellent stability in all axes of movement. I do not recommend wearing without a compression sleeve. Take your time, center the brace and adjust carefully! I have not used this brace for activities beyond fast walking/light running/swimming and general exercise, so I do not know personally how it would perform in sports that place great stress on knees, but I would certainly feel comfortable giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great to stay moving
customer_reviews.text: This knee brace is the solution for anyone that wants to have support and strength while still being super active. I play soccer twice a week and I can wear this comfortably for a full game.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: This gets my approval for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I been through a few knee braces that did not fit me or they fit me and they fell apart a few days later.But I can tell you all this brace can hang it gives you support it advises.I admit it does have it's faults it's not a perfect invention I suggest you go on Youtube to see how to put this on because I was quite puzzled how to put it on at first.Also I suggest you to practice putting the brace before your first long day with it.But the biggest con about this is that the sleeve that does comes with this does not fit me but for most people it will.
customer_reviews.author: Josh V.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Got this cause it was recommended for chondromalacia and patella tracking I put it on for five minutes and it causes pinch points and you can't even bend your knee to sit in a chair and it does not allow your knee cap to move properly and digs into the top of your knee cap.was gonna return it and Amazon says it's non returnable
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for doing some parachute training. They absolutely made all the difference in the world. I was able to do six jumps over the span of 3 days and had zero issues. They absolutely saved my knees from injury.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Size chart not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I measured my thigh circumference 6" above the knee as specified on size chart. At 17", I was well within the range for XS/S. Brace barely went around my leg, and was too tight for wearing. The opening for the knee cap was too small for comfort and left a mark when I took it off after just a few minutes. I want something for support during aqua workouts, but will be returning this one. I'm undecided about trying the next size up versus looking elsewhere or doing without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Knee Brace
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brace after being recommended by a friend. The brace works as advertised and I’m very pleased with it. My only complaint is that it cannot be worn comfortably without the knee sleeve
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this brace is a life saver. since covid 19, my knee replacement was cancelled.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: The compression undersleeve is not as pictured, so it doesn't do much except protect the leg from the brace rubbing the skin. brace has worsened the pain in my knee. Also, when I tried to return it, it said I can not return it. I am not very happy that I am unable to return....There was no mention of this in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Ehrenfried

customer_reviews.title: Very functional brace
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight brace to help with chondromalacia/patellofemoral pain after arthroscopic knee surgery. Good comfortable fit and because of the web technology it is very airy, cool and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: C Gima

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: Ortho dr had us to purchase this for my son after he destroyed his ACL - great product - been wearing it daily for almost a year
customer_reviews.author: Rayngwen

customer_reviews.title: Works and doesn't slip out of position.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to wife after her twisted knee accident. She liked the support and was happy it did not slip down like other ones did!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: This is really uncomfortable to wear all day, but for just during sports it gives good support and stays in place well. Not happy that there are no returns from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: sheri barainca

customer_reviews.title: DO not buy!
customer_reviews.text: First if you buy this item and are unsatisfied then you are not allowed to return the item. You would not know this unless you scroll all the way to the bottom of the page. The medium and large is more a medium then large and does not fit, if you bend your knee with the brace on it the velcro comes loose. I would like to know why you can not return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knee support. Light and flexible too.
customer_reviews.text: This design is wonderful for my patellar tendonopathy, transferring body weight to below the knee, reducing inflammation from downhill skiing 45 days last season. I had used a Cho-Pat double-action strap for years for the same issue and do believe it caused more pain and further injury, while it did at least hold my knee together. I went to Don-Joys' website and followed their instructions per sizing and it's a great fit. Surgery may be inevitable, but I can dance for now!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brace 8 years after ACL reconstruction
customer_reviews.text: Wore out my first one but didn’t hesitate to replace with the same brace. For me, this is the easiest, most versatile brace I have found. The graft in my ACL reconstruction didn’t heal ideally so still have daily pain and trouble with stability. This brace stabilizes my knee perfectly on active days.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to rate this
customer_reviews.text: I like this brace, but, I don't like the sleeve that came with it. There's no compression to it! I wish that the adjustable straps were made of a better more flexible material, as with a blend of spandex.
customer_reviews.author: 1addictedAmazonCust

customer_reviews.title: The main part of the brace works great and really keeps my knee cap in place if ...
customer_reviews.text: The main part of the brace works great and really keeps my knee cap in place if I wear it alone. The sleeve however makes it too slippery and it won't stay in place. If I wear the brace without the sleeve then I get blisters.Luckily its winter and I am able to wear thermals underneath the brace or I just wear it outside my pants if desperate. I wish the sleeve worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Morin

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my knee. I both roller and inline skate often and I also ride a bike a lot. My right knee has been hurting from overuse. Inside a day this has begun to help tremendously. I really enjoy the relief from the pain without taking pills.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8trDTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: This knee brace is the most comfortable and most supportive I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This knee brace is the most comfortable and most supportive I have ever used. I have tried numerous knee braces. I would have given it a five, but the piece of web directly above the kneecap tore a part after using it for a week. It might have been a defective knee brace. What I like about this brace is that it can be worn without the sleeve. This is nice because in the summer with the sleeve, it can get pretty hot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Stable. I use it mostly for cycling. I can pedal and climb without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The front part is made of rubber that is not ver compellable and therefore fit weird and didn't cover the upper part of the knee
customer_reviews.text: This was an interesting and strange brace. The front part is made of rubber that is not ver compellable and therefore fit weird and didn't cover the upper part of the knee comfortably for my husband. We returned it, disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adria H.

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace has been a god send for my knees. I have tried other braces but this one outshines them all. I wear this brace everyday and I highly recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Good Design not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I found because of swelling the side braces did not position correctly so the support was incorrectly aligned. DonJoy should provide a measurement from inner to outer joint so the hinges end up in the correct place. I purchased the OA brace with is wider longer and I find it a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Z.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit right, no matter what size I got. Did not find there was much support for my knee. Don't think this is made for a person with a little larger than normal thighs. You may have to be the size or shape of the person in the advertisement picture ( a basketball player ). I don't know if a football player could wear this because of the size of their thighs.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE PORTER

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: very professional product quality and help the knee tremendously,loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SAMEEH ABDULBAQI

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: Initially the brace felt very snug and secure while I worked out. However, after about two times wearing it, it felt loose and doesn't seem to stay in place. The velcro straps don't stay tight, and don't seem to tighten in a way that keeps my knee in place. Washing the back part (attempting to tighten it back up, in the event it did get stretched out after 2 wearings) didn't help any. Disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Woods

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this...flimsy and does not support anything, the seller will not refund my money
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice sturdy brace in the picture. However, it is NOT. This brace is soft and rubbery, the hinges are easily bent. cheap product and definitely not worth the $70 I spent on it. Horrible product, wish i would have never purchased this for my son.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the same one that was prescribed by the orthopedic surgeon.
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same one I got from the doctor for 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: JT Dimmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for my PCL injury
customer_reviews.text: I have a pcl injury and this knee brace has removed virtually all pain when i ski and run... I dont workout or do any athletics without it anymore. Ive tried a few different knee braces (4-5) and this one is the first one that actually made a noticeable difference. A bit tough to run in but if u push through the stifness of the brace it will definitely reward you.
customer_reviews.author: avid kamgar

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I also get a lot of comments about ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these approximately a year ago. I have torn meniscus in both knees and was tired of wearing the braces that have metal stays on sides as they were very hot during the summer months. These work great. I also get a lot of comments about the tattoo look of the braces. They offer great support and are much cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S. Koth

customer_reviews.title: this brace is awesome for torn acl
customer_reviews.text: this brace is awesome for torn acl. helps with walking & stability. very light & easy to wear under pants. not bulky at all
customer_reviews.author: reena

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, no returns, no seller support
customer_reviews.text: The brace is comfortable, but the Velcro straps are not strong enough. I had one of them pop off 10 or so times on a five mile hike, finally just taking off the brace and putting it in my backpack. And there doesn’t appear to be any way to return a defective product or get any support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Almost everything it says it is
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it claims to be except it has no clear indication on the sleeve. It holds up great and I’ve had no problems so far, however do not pull or get anything sharp caught on the web. It feels like it might tear if something gets caught on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  Manufacturer does not allow returns
customer_reviews.text: The brace was too stiff and did not allow for freedom of movement. When I attempted to return it I was told the manufacturer did not accept returns. HOWEVER, Amazon did issue a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable to wear , no discomfort with bending. It was too large i upsized as suggested, then i could find no way to return for a different size.
customer_reviews.author: joyce henry

customer_reviews.title: I only have to wear the brace when I feel like I'm limping now.
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my life. Just the instability of a bad knee was upsetting my entire frame. A week of wearing this brace and I can walk without the hobbling that I had become used to. This is real. But your experience will be different, of course
customer_reviews.author: vern stump

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT wear like it is shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Brace is fantastic, but you are going to need some type of sleeve to go between the rubber on the brace and your skin. I've used several options from buying the "recommended one" (which works fine), to cutting old under armor pants. Fantastic brace
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Ward

customer_reviews.title: The brace definitely worked, My pain was reduced by ...
customer_reviews.text: The brace definitely worked, My pain was reduced by a lot when i was using this brace. The downfall of the product is the Velcro or Velcro imitation they use as it does not have enough hold to stick and this causes the brace to slip and become very uncomfortable. Every 20 minutes I had the brace on it would slip and push down my patella very hard and cause me more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Reymond

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  A brace that is comfortable and not the size of Fort Worth!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many braces over the years for my poor torn up knees. I had a knee replacement a few years ago and have been trying different braces. They have all been clunky and hot and uncomfortable. Until this one. It's light and gives me just the right amount of support when I walk, bike and play golf. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Charmer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It did not conform to my knee very well and keep slipping down. It also did not provide much support for my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Knee brace
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose or light support and and helps with perspiration. The silicone does feel warm.
customer_reviews.author: TexGult

customer_reviews.title: Love It! I have had 2 meniscus surgeries and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love It! I have had 2 meniscus surgeries and I won't give up my tennis. This brace is comfortable while giving me the support I need to play worry free. I prefer it without the sleeve because it feels more secure and does not slip. Follow the sizing guidelines and the fit will be perfect. I am very happy with this brace!
customer_reviews.author: Arnke01

customer_reviews.title: Weak straps
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but the straps seams separated the very first time I put it on. Very disappointed... donjoy usually is top of the line. Maybe the Web performance is better?..
customer_reviews.author: L. Lyng

customer_reviews.title: Love this brace
customer_reviews.text: Love this brace. BYE BYE knee pain. In addition, no more rashes from knee braces. This is the first knee brace where I have Not gotten a heat rash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money and probably does more harm than good
customer_reviews.text: waste of money and probably does more harm than good. I am returning it. It does not stay fit on your knee and as this bulky contraption moves around it actually puts more pressure on your kneecap in damaging ways
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Too Small, Too Big????
customer_reviews.text: I 1st bought the small and it was just a wee bit too small, and I am not a big person! So then I bought the Med and it's too big!! It slides around while I'm wearing it all day lone, while I'm skiing and I have to keep adjusting it all the time! If I don't it puts wicked pressure on my bony knees!!! I can't return it, so I just try dealing with it and finish out the season!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: Look at the return policy before you buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is not good even though I used the measurement instructions. This brace is completely unhelpful and does not provide the support the description suggests. Made my knee hurt more, not less. Look at the return policy before you purchase this product. I tried to return it and was provided the “this product is inellegible for return” message.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Anderson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Best brace I have ever used! I have had surgery on both knees but still have trouble with them. This brace is awesome for support especically when I have to be on my feet or walk for long periods. The measurement guide for fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a very elegant, not bulky solution ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a very elegant, not bulky solution to help supporting my patellar tendon. My one and only complaint is that the bottom hard plastic loops through which the velcro straps run press on my leg quite a lot and gets uncomfortable after 30min or so. But I can tolerate that
customer_reviews.author: simple user

product_meta.title: DonJoy Reaction Web Knee Support Brace with Compression Undersleeve: Grey, Medium/Large
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Size:Medium/LargeThe DonJoy Reaction WEB Knee Brace uses a responsive, webbed approach to knee pain that gives you a distinct alternative to the basic knee sleeve. Developed by world renowned orthopedic surgeon, Dr. William Nordt, the DonJoy Reaction WEB can help decrease knee pain and increase function, getting you back to your active lifestyle. The elastomeric web is an innovative solution that absorbs shock, disperses energy and shifts pain away from your knee. This webbing acts to dynamically stabilize the patella (kneecap) on all sides, bringing the patella into proper tracking position to reduce pain. The open framework of the elastomeric web, in combination with the mesh backing, creates a comfortable fit and a breathable solution for relief of anterior knee pain. It's secured with Velcro straps, and weighs only 0.5 lbs. The lightweight design makes this knee brace ideal for all-day use. One undersleeve is included, and is made of 85% nylon/15% spandex. The DonJoy Reaction WEB can be used to treat or prevent the following knee injuries: patellofemoral pain syndrome (PFPS), chondromalacia patella (runner’s knee), quadriceps or patellar tendonitis/tendinosis (jumper’s knee), Osgood-Schlatter disease, general patellar tracking issues and instability, and mild knee osteoarthritis. The DonJoy Reaction WEB is worn by professional snowboarders, volleyball, football players; as well as the U.S. Snowboarding and U.S. Ski teams. Universal fit allows the DonJoy Reaction WEB Knee Brace to be worn on either the left or the right leg.
feature_bullets: Innovative web design absorbs shock, disperses energy and shifts pain away from your knee
Open webbing framework coupled with the mesh backing creates a comfortable fit and a breathable solution
Webbing acts to dynamically stabilize the patella (kneecap) on all sides, bringing the patella into proper tracking position to reduce pain
Lightweight design makes this knee brace ideal for all-day use; Includes one undersleeve made of 85% nylon/15% spandex

Universal fit allows the DonJoy Reaction WEB Knee Brace to be worn on either the left or the right leg. Fit tip-circumference measurements should be taken at knee center 6 inch above and below the knee center

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
